short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select one or many Google Docs and have it converted to PDF, Zipped up and emailed to you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zip and send allows you to select multiple files from Google Drive and convert it to PDF and send it yourselves as a ZIP file.
